Package gymmanager

Class GymManager

java.lang.Object
gymmanager.GymManager
public class GymManager extends Object
Main input/output class. Continuously reads input from user, determines command, then executes necessary methods.
Author:
Aaron Newland, Dylan Pina

    • st

      StringTokenizer st

      private boolean oldMemberFlag

    • db

      MemberDatabase db

      ClassSchedule classes

  • Constructor Details

    • GymManager

      public GymManager()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Creates a new MemberDatabase object, initializes fitness classes, and takes input from user until 'Q' is read.

    • setCommand

      private void setCommand(String command)
      Selects the appropriate operation using the operation code given. If operation code is not listed then it is an invalid command.
      Parameters:
      command - the operation code to determine command to execute

    • loadMemberData

      private void loadMemberData()
      Loads historic member data from text file named "memberList.txt Sets oldMemberFlag to "true" then to "false" so addMember() doesn't calculate expire date

    • determineClass

      private FitnessClass determineClass(String className)
      Determines the fitness class given the name of a fitness class.
      Parameters:
      className - String containing the name of class to find.
      Returns:
      FitnessClass object if class is found, null otherwise.

    • initFitnessClasses

      private void initFitnessClasses()
      Initializes fitness classes: Pilates, Spinning, and Cardio by reading class data from text file "classSchedule.txt".

    • findTime

      private Time findTime(String timeOfDay)
      Determines the time by being given a time of day, "MORNING", "AFTERNOON", "EVENING".
      Parameters:
      timeOfDay - String representing the time of day.
      Returns:
      Time object of the time of day based on given string.

    • addMember

      private void addMember(char tier)
      Continues reading member information from input, then calls for checks to ensure appropriate values for member fields. Determines membership tier (member, family, premium). Finally, sets values to appropriate member fields.

    • determineMembership

      private Member determineMembership(char tier)
      Determines the membership tier given a character indicating the tier. M for member, F for family, and P for premium
      Parameters:
      tier - character indicating the level of membership.
      Returns:
      Member object if member tier is determined, null otherwise

    • findLocation

      private Location findLocation(String locationName)
      Determines the home location of a new gym member that is being added to the database
      Parameters:
      locationName - String of member's gym location that needs to be found
      Returns:
      Location object of gym members location, returns null Location if location not found

    • removeMember

      private void removeMember()
      Checks if member is in database, if true then the member gets removed.

    • printFitnessClasses

      private void printFitnessClasses(String header)
      Prints out list of fitness classes, instructor name, time, and participants (if any).

    • checkIn

      private void checkIn()
      Checks given member information is valid, and then checks member in for desired fitness class if there are no time conflicts. Then checks member in.

    • checkInGuests

      private void checkInGuests()
      Checks given member information is valid to be able to check in guest, and then checks that member location is the same as the class location to allow them to go to that class. Then checks member in.

    • checkout

      private void checkout()
      Checks if member is valid and checked into appropriate fitness class, then drops them from that fitness class.

    • checkoutGuests

      private void checkoutGuests()
      Checks if given member sponsoring guest is valid and that guest checked into appropriate fitness class. Then drops them from that fitness class.

    • validBirthDate

      private boolean validBirthDate(Member member)
      Checks that birthdate is a valid calendar date, is earlier than today, and is over the age of 18.
      Parameters:
      member - member to get date of birth from.
      Returns:
      true if date of birth is valid, false otherwise.

    • getFitnessClass

      private FitnessClass getFitnessClass()
      Continues reading from input to get information of fitness class to be retrieved. Then performs checks to ensure that class is valid.
      Returns:
      FitnessClass if the class exists, null otherwise.

    • instructorExists

      private boolean instructorExists(String instructor)
      Checks given instructor against instructors teaching classes to see if they exist.
      Parameters:
      instructor - String of instructor to check.
      Returns:
      true if instructor exists, false otherwise.

    • classNameExists

      private boolean classNameExists(String className)
      Checks given class name against names of classing being offered to see if they exist.
      Parameters:
      className - String of class name to check.
      Returns:
      true if class name exists, false otherwise.

    • quitProgram

      private void quitProgram()
      Terminates program.
